body.raw:
{
  "name": "Summer Photography Contest 2024",
  "description": "Showcase your best summer moments! Capture the essence of summer through your lens. Winners will be selected based on creativity, composition, and storytelling.",
  "has_rewards": true,
  "rewards": "First Place: $500 cash prize, Second Place: $300, Third Place: $200. All winners get featured on our homepage.",
  "organizer_name": "John Doe",
  "organizer_contact": "john.doe@example.com",
  "start_date": "2026-07-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "end_date": "2026-08-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "min_content_per_account": 3,
  "scoring_criteria": "Judges will evaluate based on: 1) Creativity (30%), 2) Technical Quality (30%), 3) Storytelling (25%), 4) Audience Engagement (15%)"
}
